title: Trump, in reversal, opposes TikTok ban, calls Facebook "enemy of the people"
description: In 2020, Trump signed an executive order banning U.S. companies from transactions with ByteDance, the Chinese parent company of TikTok.

title: Beyonce's new album might feature this classic Dolly Parton song
description: Dolly Parton, who has praised Beyoncé's foray into country, says one of her classic hits might be featured on Queen Bey's new album.

title: Ryan Gosling, Emma Stone, "Oppenheimer" and more 2024 Oscars highlights
description: "Oppenheimer" won best picture during the 2024 Academy Awards Sunday, dominating seven categories throughout the night. Emma Stone, Da'Vine Joy Randolph, Ryan Gosling and Jimmy Kimmel also shined bright during this year's ceremony. Nigel Smith, a senior movies editor at People, joins CBS News with a look at the highlights.

title: Ukraine vows to keep fighting Russia amid stalled U.S. aid effort
description: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy is remaining firm on his objective to continue fighting the war against Russia, calling on the U.S. to allocate the funds needed to help arm Ukraine's soldiers on the frontline. CBS News senior foreign correspondent Charlie D'Agata reports.

title: Trump could clinch Republican nomination on Tuesday
description: Tuesday could be the day former President Donald Trump gains enough delegates to secure the Republican presidential nomination. CBS News campaign reporters Olivia Rinaldi and Taurean Small have more.

title: Brittany Mahomes urges moms to "take care of your pelvic floor"
description: Brittany Mahomes is bringing attention to the importance of pelvic floor health for women. Experts share what to know.

title: Biden to campaign in Michigan for 1st time since protest vote test
description: President Biden is set to campaign in Michigan on Thursday, a battleground state where he's faced backlash from some progressives over his response to the Israel-Hamas war. Michigan Democratic Rep. Haley Stevens joins "America Decides" to discuss the state of the president's reelection campaign.

title: Biden budget would cut taxes for millions. Here's who would qualifiy.
description: President Joe Biden's proposed 2025 budget outlines a range of tax breaks geared to both individuals and families.

title: Trump, in reversal, says he opposes banning TikTok
description: Former President Donald Trump said in an interview Monday he believes TikTok is a national security threat, but he doesn't support banning it. A bill that could lead to just that is gaining momentum in Congress. CBS News congressional correspondent Nikole Killion reports.

title: Netanyahu rejects Biden's criticism of Gaza war approach
description: Tensions are rising between President Biden and Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu over the war in Gaza. CBS News chief White House correspondent Nancy Cordes has the latest.

title: The latest on investigations into Boeing over Alaska Airlines door blowout
description: Multiple agencies are investigating Boeing over the Jan. 5 Alaska Airlines mid-air door blowout, including the Justice Department. CBS News senior transportation correspondent Kris Van Cleave has the latest.

title: Senate holds worldwide threats hearing with top intelligence, law enforcement officials testifying
description: U.S. intelligence and law enforcement officials are testifying before the Senate Intelligence Committee Monday as part of an annual assessment on worldwide threats. CBS News intelligence and national security reporter Olivia Gazis reports.

title: 3 children, 2 adults killed in school bus crash in downstate Illinois
description: Illinois State Police said the bus hit a semi-trailer truck.

title: Antelope Valley to play NAIA basketball tournament despite school closing
description: The University of Antelope Valley men's basketball team will still play at the National Association of Intercollegiate Athletics (NAIA) tournament after the school closed due to financial issues. Crowdfunding for the team has raised close to $50,000, which will be used to fund the team's needs. Jordan Mast, the University of Antelope Valley men's basketball coach, joins CBS News with more.

title: Sexual orientation, gender ID can now be talked about in Florida classrooms
description: Students and teachers will be able to speak freely about sexual orientation and gender identity in Florida classrooms, provided it's not part of instruction.

title: Lauren Boebert drops permanent restraining order request against ex-husband
description: Colorado Congresswoman Lauren Boebert has withdrawn her request for a permanent restraining order against her ex-husband Jayson Boebert.

title: Netanyahu vows to expand into Rafah as Biden expresses concerns
description: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu is dismissing President Biden's concerns over Israel's military approach in Gaza, vowing to move forward with an offensive in Rafah. CBS News' Chris Livesay and Weijia Jiang report.

title: Biden, Trump target key voters for 2024 general election
description: President Biden and former President Donald Trump are turning their attention to November's general election where they will have to sway certain key voters in battleground states that could swing the outcome of the presidential race. CBS News campaign reporters Aaron Navarro and Olivia Rinaldi report.

title: Home equity is up $1.3 trillion year-over-year: 5 reasons to tap into yours now
description: The average homeowner currently has a lot of home equity to borrow from. Here are five reasons to tap into yours.

title: Airbnb bans indoor security cameras for all its listings
description: Homeowners who list their properties on Airbnb have until April 30 to comply with the rental platform's new policy.

title: Proposal would allow terminal patients in France to request help to die
description: The bill would allow a terminally ill person to self-administer a lethal substance under certain conditions.

title: What was nearly nude John Cena really wearing at the Oscars?
description: John Cena appeared to make his memorable turn at the Oscars in the buff. In fact, his modesty was preserved thanks to a wardrobe aid often used in Hollywood.

title: The 6 best TVs for 2024, including one for under $400
description: Based on our research and testing, these our picks for the top five TVs you can get right now.

title: Men charged with bombing woman's home, planning python attack
description: Two men from Georgia are accused of setting off an explosive device at a woman's home. They're also accused of plotting a python attack on the victim's daughter.

title: 4 space station crew members head for Tuesday splashdown
description: The International Space Station crew members are expected to splash down near the Florida Panhandle to close out a nearly 200-day stay in space.

title: Blinken to Jamaica for urgent Haiti meeting
description: Secretary of State Antony Blinken is attending an emergency meeting in Jamaica with Caribbean leaders Monday over the ongoing crisis in Haiti. Over the weekend, the U.S. military evacuated non-essential personnel at the American embassy in Port-au-Prince as heavily armed gangs target key government sites and issue threats of violence. CBS News correspondent Manuel Bojorquez reports.

title: The PlayStation Portal Remote Player is in stock at Walmart today, plus more buying options
description: If you want to get your hands on the PlayStation Portal remote player it's in stock at Walmart and StockX now.

title: Princess Kate acknowledges editing photo of her family
description: The recent photo released of Catherine, Princess of Wales, and her kids isn't what it seems. Here's what we know about it so far.

title: The best cell phones of 2024 have amazing cameras, gorgeous screens and longer battery life
description: If you're shopping for a new smartphone, here are our top picks for 2024.

title: 3 reasons you shouldn't wait to get debt relief
description: Are you waiting to see if times get better before you enroll in debt relief? Here's why that could be a mistake.

title: Dazzling Webb telescope images reveal "ghostly glow" of newborn stars
description: Two new images from the James Webb Space Telescope offer an unprecedented view of a stellar nursery in the Triangulum galaxy, about 2.73 million light-years away.

title: Rise in use of weight-loss drugs before pregnancy
description: Doctors are seeing more women turn to weight-loss drugs ahead of pregnancy. Studies show that being overweight can increase the chances of pregnancy complications, including miscarriages. And while the FDA does not authorize the use of weight loss medications during pregnancy, there is limited information on their effects before conception. Dr. Ilana Ramer Bass, an assistant professor in the division of endocrinology, diabetes and metabolism at Mount Sinai, joined CBS News to discuss the trend.

title: Free yourself from clutter with the best document scanners in 2024
description: Use any of these best scanners to create space-saving digital versions of your paper files and photos.

title: Some turn to weight-loss medications ahead of pregnancy
description: Getting pregnant at a healthier weight can help prevent preeclampsia and gestational diabetes and make labor and postpartum recovery easier.

title: Best TSA-approved locking luggage in 2024
description: Protect your valuables on your next vacation with TSA-approved locking luggage by Travelpro, Away, Rimowa and more.

title: U.S. evacuates some embassy staff in Haiti amid gang violence in Port-au-Prince
description: The U.S. is evacuating non-essential personnel from its embassy in Haiti as violence in the nation's capital escalates after a massive prison break earlier this month. The situation in Port-au-Prince has become increasingly dire with many unable to find basic necessities. CBS News' Vladimir Duthiers has a look at the crisis. And Richard Cantave, the CEO of global tourism company Haitian Nomad, joined CBS News with further insight.

title: Trump allies named as new RNC leaders
description: Former President Donald Trump campaigned in Georgia over the weekend after a big leadership shake-up in the Republican National Committee. A longtime Trump ally, Michael Whatley, was elected as chair and Trump's daughter-in-law, Lara Trump, was named co-chair. CBS News campaign reporter Zak Hudak has more.

title: The best tablets for 2024 are powerhouses great for work or play
description: Choose one of our top tablet picks for a piece of no-nonsense tech you'll use in a variety of situations.

title: Trump seeks delay of "hush money" trial as Supreme Court weighs immunity
description: Trump's attorneys asked a judge to delay the trial until after the Supreme Court rules on whether Trump is shielded from criminal prosecution.

title: Man bitten by crocodile after his boat capsized in Everglades National Park
description: The boater was attempting to swim to shore when he was bitten

title: Renewed push for aid for radiation victims of U.S. nuclear program
description: Since 1990, the U.S. government has compensated some families with the Radiation Exposure Compensation Act, but the program's future is threatened by budget standoffs.

title: Peter Navarro ordered to report to federal prison by March 19
description: Former Trump White House trade adviser Peter Navarro has been ordered to report to federal prison in one week.

title: HUD Secretary Marcia Fudge to leave Biden administration
description: Housing and Urban Development Secretary Marcia Fudge has led the department since the start of the Biden administration.

title: Get these viral motion-sensor lights for up to 50% off on Amazon
description: Lepotec's TikTok-famous motion sensor lights are on sale for a limited time on Amazon.

title: Biden releases 2025 budget proposal, laying out vision for second term
description: President Biden has issued a budget proposal for a second term aimed at getting voters' attention with tax breaks for families, lower health care costs, smaller deficits and higher taxes on the wealthy and corporations.

title: 3 moves savers should make ahead of the upcoming inflation report
description: A new inflation report will be released this week. Here are a few important moves to make beforehand.

title: 8 kids, 1 adult die after eating sea turtle in Zanzibar, officials say
description: Sea turtle meat is considered a delicacy in Zanzibar even though it periodically results in deaths from chelonitoxism, a type of food poisoning.

title: Mass kidnappings show Nigerian officials have lost control, expert says
description: A security expert told CBS News that 17 mass kidnappings in 10 years in Nigeria shows "the state does not have control over the country's security."

title: UT Austin brings back standardized testing requirements for applicants
description: The requirement was suspended in 2020 due to limited testing availability during the COVID-19 pandemic.

title: This viral food prep tool changed my life. It's 46% off on Amazon today
description: I tried the TikTok-famous Fullstar vegetable chopper, on sale for $35 at Amazon now. It's worth the hype.

title: This viral food prep tool changed my life. It's 46% off on Amazon today
description: I tried the TikTok-famous Fullstar vegetable chopper, on sale for $35 at Amazon now. It's worth the hype.

title: "Oppenheimer" wins 7 Oscars: Everything to know about this year's Academy Awards
description: "Oppenheimer" won big, Al Pacino skipped announcing the Best Picture nominations, John Cena presented naked and Ryan Gosling stole the show with a rendition of "I'm Just Ken." "Entertainment Tonight" co-hosts Nischelle Turner and Kevin Frazier go through the biggest moments from the 2024 Oscars.

title: Trader Joe's $2.99 mini tote bags now sell for $500 on eBay
description: The canvas bags have become a collector's item, with Trader Joe's placing limits on how many customers are allowed to buy.

title: Trump roasted Jimmy Kimmel during the Oscars, and Kimmel read it on air
description: Jimmy Kimmel read Donald Trump's scathing review during the 2024 Oscars ceremony — and threw a dig at the GOP presidential frontrunner.

title: 1980 murder victim identified as Marine who served in Vietnam
description: The remains of a man found murdered in Florida in 1980 have been identified as William Irving Monroe III, a U.S. Marine who served in Vietnam.

title: A look at red carpet Oscar fashion trends
description: Hollywood's finest dazzled at the Oscars. Here are some of the highlights from the red carpet.

title: Will mortgage interest rates drop after the Fed's March meeting? Here's what experts predict
description: Hoping that mortgage rates will decline after the Fed meets? Here's what the experts say could happen.

title: Sen. Bob Menendez faces arraignment for latest obstruction charges
description: Last Tuesday, Menendez and his wife were charged with obstruction of justice in a new 18-count indictment.

title: The ARChive of Contemporary Music's quest for survival
description: The ARChive of Contemporary Music, one of the world's largest collections of popular music recordings. But it is at risk as it searches for a new location to preserve its century-old treasures.

title: American Express warns of customer data breach
description: If you are an American Express cardholder, your data may be vulnerable. Last week, the company announced that account information of an undisclosed number of customers may have been breached in a third-party hack. Stefanie Schappert, a senior journalist at Cybernews, joined CBS News to discuss the hack.

title: Miami starts spring break crackdown
description: Miami Beach has begun its breakup with spring break with city officials enforcing new public safety measures including safety patrols, DUI checks and curfews. Beaches are also closing overnight. CBS News correspondent Cristian Benavides has more.

title: How one dog and her new owner brought kindness into the lives of many
description: When Gaia's owner died, her next door neighbor took her in – and brought her into the hearts of countless others through Gaia's training as a therapy dog.

title: How to watch today's Chelsea vs. Newcastle Premier League soccer match: Livestream options, starting time
description: Find out when and how to watch today's Chelsea vs. Newcastle soccer match, even if you don't have cable.

title: Celebrating Women's History Month with inspiring book recommendations
description: In honor of Women's History Month, dive into female-centric stories with a list of inspiring book recommendations from Amazon's editorial director Sarah Gelman.

title: Exclusive discounts from CBS Mornings Deals
description: On this edition of CBS Mornings Deals, Adriane Kiss shows us items that might just become essentials in your everyday life. Visit cbsdeals.com to take advantage of these exclusive deals today. CBS earns commissions on purchases made through cbsdeals.com.

title: 5 missing skiers found dead in Swiss Alps, search for 6th continues
description: Five cross-country skiers - including members of the same family - were found dead along a high Alpine ridge.

title: Which gold investment type is best for inflation protection?
description: Want to use gold as an inflationary hedge? These are your best gold asset options right now, experts say.

title: A simple act of kindness transforms life of a Texas dog
description: “CBS Mornings” lead national correspondent David Begnaud has the heartwarming story of a dog in Dallas, Texas, whose life was forever changed by a stranger's kindness, illustrating the true essence of being a good neighbor.

title: Retiring in America increasingly means working into old age, new book says
description: America's retirement system has left behind 90% of workers. "We see big gaps with the rich and the poor in terms of who gets to retire," one expert said.

title: Reddit to raise nearly $750 million in an IPO. Here's what to know.
description: In an unusual move, Reddit plans to offer 1.7 million shares in its upcoming IPO to its own users and moderators. Here's what to know.

title: California halts some stone-cutting work over health risks after "CBS Mornings" report
description: California has halted stone-cutting work at some fabrication shops in the Los Angeles area after a “CBS Mornings” report found that workers were getting sick or even dying from exposure to silica dust while cutting a popular countertop material used in kitchens and bathrooms. CBS News consumer investigative correspondent Anna Werner has the new details.

title: Eye Opener: The big winners from the 96th Academy Awards
description: It was a big night for "Oppenheimer" as they led the way with 7 Academy Award wins. Also, President Joe Biden and Donald Trump host dueling rallies in Georgia. All that and all that matters in today’s Eye Opener.

title: Oscar glory for "Oppenheimer" and "Poor Things"
description: At the 96th Academy Awards, "Oppenheimer" led the night with seven Oscars including best picture, while "Poor Things" claimed four awards, including best actress for Emma Stone. Da'Vine Joy Randolph's win for best supporting actress also marked a night of memorable speeches and achievements.

title: China's People's Congress concludes
description: China just ended the once-a-year meeting of its rubber-stamp parliament, the People's Congress.Thousands of leaders from around the country voted on the government's priorities. But only officials mattered.

title: U.S. steps up embassy security in Haiti as gang violence worsens
description: As gang violence in Haiti exacerbates a spiraling humanitarian crisis, the U.S. military has sent additional security forces to the American embassy there and evacuated non-essential personnel.

title: The biggest winners and key moments of the 2024 Oscars
description: At the 96th Academy Awards, "Oppenheimer" led the charge with 13 nominations and seven wins, including best picture, while "Barbie" snagged a single award. Emma Stone's win for best actress and Cillian Murphy's in the best actor category highlighted the night.

title: Controversy surrounds Princess Catherine's first official photo post-surgery
description: A touching family portrait of Princess Catherine with her children was released to show her recovery after surgery, but it raised more speculation as major news agencies recalled it over photo manipulation.

title: Baby killed, parents injured in apparent attack by family dog in New Jersey
description: Authorities said the mother and child "had sustained serious injuries from the dog." The baby was pronounced dead at the scene.

title: Netanyahu dismisses Biden's warning over "innocent lives" lost in Gaza
description: Israeli leader Benjamin Netanyahu says President Biden is wrong to suggest Israel's actions in Gaza are doing more harm than good.

title: Tensions rise between President Biden and Israeli Prime Minister Netanyahu over Gaza conflict
description: Following President Biden's critical remarks on Benjamin Netanyahu’s handling of the Gaza war, the Israeli prime minister is pushing back.

title: Both pilots fall asleep flying plane with more than 150 on board
description: One of the pilots woke up to find that the aircraft "was not on the correct flight path," an incident report says.

title: 2024 presidential race heats up in Georgia as Biden and Trump rally ahead of primaries
description: With critical primaries looming, President Biden and former President Donald Trump exchange sharp criticisms in Georgia. Tuesday’s primaries could give each of them enough delegates to win their party's nominations.

title: Russell Wilson signing one-year deal with Steelers, reports say
description: Wilson is set to be released from the Denver Broncos when the NFL's league year begins this week.

title: Kate, Princess of Wales, apologizes for family picture photoshop fail
description: "Like many amateur photographers, I do occasionally experiment with editing," Kate, the Princess of Wales, said on social media.

title: Drug lord known as "The Tsar" arrested at luxury villa in Colombia
description: Julio Andres Murillo Figueroa was considered the main supplier to the "Swedish Pablo Escobar" and had direct links to Colombia's largest drug cartel, police said.

title: Man who shot his mother dead thought she was intruder, his lawyer says
description: Police say Jaylen Johnson shot his mother to death in their suburban St. Louis home. His lawyer says Johnson thought she was an intruder and "hasn't stopped crying."

title: Crash of small private jet in rural Virginia kills all 5 on board
description: A small private jet crashed in woods and burned near a small rural Virginia airport, killing all five people aboard, including a child, police said.

title: 5 dead in apparent murder-suicide in Honolulu home
description: Honolulu police were investigating the apparent murder-suicide of a family in a home. They said the husband apparently stabbed his wife and three kids, then himself.

title: Dozens hurt by "strong movement" on flight from Australia to New Zealand
description: At least 50 people were injured by what officials described as a "strong movement" on a Chilean plane traveling from Sydney, Australia to Auckland, New Zealand.

title: Federal judge blocks easier unionization for big companies' workers
description: A federal judge in Texas has blocked a new federal rule that would have made it easier big companies' workers to unionize just as it was to go into effect.

title: Disneyland seeks approval of major expansion to add more immersive attractions
description: Disney is seeking approval from local officials to expand its California theme park offerings over the next four decades.

title: 2024 Oscar winners: See who took home a trophy
description: "Oppenheimer" scored some of the top categories at the 96th Academy Awards, including best director, best actor and best picture. But there were several other big winners of the night. Here's a list.

title: 3/10/2024: Rise; Jeff Koons
description: First, a report on a camp for grieving Ukrainians in the Austrian Alps. Then, Jeff Koons: The 60 Minutes Interview.

title: 3/10/2024: An Island Off An Island; Caligula's Gardens; Return to Gorongosa
description: First, a look at Fogo Island's comeback story. Then, uncovering Caligula's gardens. And, a report on rehabilitating Gorongosa National Park.

title: Nearly naked John Cena presents Oscar for best costume design
description: The actor showed up to the 2024 Academy Awards​ stage Sunday night naked save for a prestigious Oscars envelope.

title: 3/10: The Takeout: Anthony Mason
description: CBS News' Anthony Mason joins Major Garrett on The Takeout to discuss his career beginnings & transition from covering business to music.  Anthony discusses building trust with some of the world's most famous artists, the ever-changing music business, and his experience writing a song.

title: Who did the Oscars 2024 In Memoriam include? See the full list
description: Here's who was remembered during the 2024 Oscars In Memoriam tribute during the Academy Awards.
